name: Wobble Mania
description:
The start of something that is completely unrelated to cough cough Lemmings cough cough...

To get to level one, just hit space or a mouse button in the intro.

Try saving the Wobbles using 2 types of widgets... a cave IN and a cave OUT... The goal for the Wobbles is that cheesy castle thing at the bottom right of the level. Note to self: draw something that better fits into the overall art style...

The red radar thingy in the middle? Grab it to move around the level, or use the cursor keys (or ASDW). (Known issue: Sometimes it won't let itself be grabbed, the cheeky little radar, tch... Just give it a bit, and try again.)

Hold on the Radar until the countdown under the hand reaches ZERO (aka "0") to zoom to a random Wobble... You can also tap SPACE to jump to a random Wobble - that only works if you have a space bar.

When you have an active Widget, you can erase one placed widget of the same kind if the widget available count == 0.

Choose a widget at the bottom left with the mouse or the #s 1,2,3,4,5,etc... again, the #s only work if you have a keyboard. Neither my phone nor my tablet has a keyboard, so kinda out of luck trying to use keys.

I think that's about it, for now?

Yeah.... that's all for now, folks!

More soon!

20220522
